content: to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 62 round 16 single_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet 62 fasten_off turn the hat inside out and weave in ends leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced edited or modified in any way or manner and claimed as your own all photos are copyrighted me 6 average adult height should be 8-8 25 with h hook round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 11 double_crochet in the magic_ring pull tight join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 11 round 2 2 double_crochet in the same stitch as join and in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 22 round 3 1 double_crochet in the same stitch as join *2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 double_crochet in next stitch* repeat from *around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 33 round 4 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 44 round 5 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 55 round 6 *1 double_crochet in each of the first 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 66 round 7-14 * 1 double_crochet in each stitch around join to the first double_crochet of the round and chain 2 66 switch to g hook round 15 half_double_crochet around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 66 round 16 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 66 round 17 half_double_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet and chain 2 66 round 18 single_crochet in third loop around **join to first half_double_crochet 66 fasten_off turn the hat inside out and weave in ends leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced edited or modified in any way or manner and claimed as your own all photos are copyrighted and the sole property of leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner and may not be shared or used you may sell your finished products at stores craft shows and online but if you sell online please credit me 7 special join to join take your ho ok out and place it backward through the first stitch of the round step 2 place yarn over your hook and tighten pull through the stitch step
